name: Bunny Triggered
title: Amber: Bunny Triggered
inPlayDescription: After your Amber, who has this card equipped, uses a Normal Attack: If this card and Baron Bunny are still on the field, then Baron Bunny explodes and deals 4 Pyro DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Amber to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Amber, equip this card.
After Amber equips this card, immediately use Explosive Puppet once.
After you use a Normal Attack: If this card and Baron Bunny are still on the field, then Baron Bunny explodes and deals 4 Pyro DMG.
(You must have Amber in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
